Headline: #73 Armitage Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Armitage/LeClaire
ShortDescription: Eastbound 73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted via Armitage, Grand, Cicero and Armitage due to street blockage near Armitage/LeClaire.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted via Armitage, Grand, Cicero and Armitage due to street blockage near Armitage/LeClaire.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Reroute at Grand/May
ShortDescription: 65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Ogden, Chicago, Halsted and Grand due to street blockage near Grand/May.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Ogden, Chicago, Halsted and Grand, due to street blockage near Grand/May.

Allow extra travel time.
